creator: johan.eker@emp.ericsson.se
text:
The JavaCC optional task does not work for JavaCC version 3.0 which was 
recently released. The expected commandline has changed slightly. Javacc 
version 3.0 uses a real (almost, still missing the manifest) jar file 
(javacc.jar) and not (JavaCC.zip). Furthermore the main class is no longer 
"COM.sun.labs.javacc.Main" but simply "javacc".
